results.title: The effect of simvastatin and erythropoietin on renal fibrosis in rats with unilateral ureteral obstruction.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @GENE_EPO @GENE_24335 @@@erythropoietin@@@ on @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Ureteral_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014517 @@@unilateral ureteral obstruction@@@.

citations.NLM: Acikgoz Y, Can B, Bek K, Acikgoz A, Ozkaya O, Genç G, Sarikaya S. The effect of simvastatin and erythropoietin on renal fibrosis in rats with unilateral ureteral obstruction. Ren Fail. 2014 Mar;36(2):252-7. PMID: 24083846

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates renal inflammation, tubular transdifferentiation and interstitial fibrosis in rats with unilateral ureteral obstruction.
results.text_hl: We sought to investigate more closely the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal interstitial fibrosis@@@ due to @<m>DISEASE_Ureteral_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014517 @@@unilateral ureteral obstruction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ureteral_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014517 @@@UUO@@@).

citations.NLM: Vieira JM Jr, Mantovani E, Rodrigues LT, Dellê H, Noronha IL, Fujihara CK, Zatz R. Simvastatin attenuates renal inflammation, tubular transdifferentiation and interstitial fibrosis in rats with unilateral ureteral obstruction. Nephrol Dial Transplant. 2005 Aug;20(8):1582-91.
